structure.unit: ALCOHOLIC BEVERAGES -- PROHIBITIONS, RESTRICTIONS, AND REGULATIONS

law.catch_line: Gift card for alcoholic beverages to be redeemed only by persons 21 and older.
law.text: No person under the age of twenty-one (21) may redeem a gift card or any portion of a gift card for the purchase of alcoholic beverages. A person holding a license under KRS 243.030 or 243.040 may redeem a gift card for the purchase of alcoholic beverages if the person presenting the card is twenty-one (21) years of age or older.
law.history: Created 2006 Ky. Acts ch. 28, sec. 2, effective July 12, 2006.
